I added a method to Privileged accessor that makes it easier to call a
func=
tion whose
arguments are of primitive types. Hope this saves time for someo=
ne using
it :)

/**
      * Calls a method on the given object instance wit=
h the given
arguments.
      * When mtehod arguments are of primitive types=
 type
      * boxing will make it impossible to acess them, so use this ver=
sion
      *
      * @param instance
      *            the object instance=

      * @param methodName
      *            the name of the method to inv=
oke
      * @param args
      *            an array of objects to pass as a=
rguments
      * @see PrivilegedAccessor#invokeMethod(Object,String,Object)=

      *
      * Ramon Talavera: Ramon.Talavera@...
      */

     pu=
blic static Object invokeMethod_use_primitive_types_in_args(
             O=
bject instance, String methodName, Object[] args)
             throws NoSuc=
hMethodException, IllegalAccessException,
             InvocationTargetExce=
ption {
         Class[] classTypes =3D null;
         if (args !=3D null) =
{
             classTypes =3D new Class[args.length];
             for (int=
 i =3D 0; i < args.length; i++) {
                 if (args[i] !=3D null) {=

                     classTypes[i] =3D args[i].getClass();
               =
      if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Integer.class)
                         clas=
sTypes[i] =3D Integer.TYPE;
                     else
                     =
    if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Long.class)
                                 c=
lassTypes[i] =3D Long.TYPE;
                     else
                     =
    if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Short.class)
                                 =
    classTypes[i] =3D Short.TYPE;
                     else
               =
          if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Double.class)
                         c=
lassTypes[i] =3D Double.TYPE;
                     else
                   =
          if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Float.class)
                           =
      classTypes[i] =3D Float.TYPE;
                     else
             =
            if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Boolean.class)
                       =
      classTypes[i] =3D Boolean.TYPE;
                     else
           =
              if (classTypes[i] =3D=3D Byte.class)
                        =
         classTypes[i] =3D Byte.TYPE;


                 }
             }
 =
        }

         Method method=3DgetMethod(instance, methodName, classTy=
pes);
         if (method=3D=3Dnull)
             return null;

         re=
turn method.invoke(instance,
                 args);
     }
